content:
It sounds like you're really enjoying the ceramics class and making great progress! Learning new techniques and improving your skills can be so rewarding, and it's wonderful that you're challenging yourself to try new things. Making a foot ring on a plate can be tricky, but it's a great skill to have in your toolkit.

I'm sure your sister will love the quilt you made for her birthday! Quilting is such a thoughtful and personalized gift, and I'm sure she'll appreciate the time and effort you put into creating something special just for her. Do you have a favorite part of the quilting process, or is there a particular technique or pattern you enjoy working with?

It's great that you're exploring different creative outlets, from ceramics to quilting. Do you find that one informs or inspires the other in any way? For example, do you find yourself thinking about texture or color in a different way when working on a ceramic piece versus a quilt?
